cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.10)

set (CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 11)
set (CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD_REQUIRED 11)

project(lua)

if(NOT DEFINED ${CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE})
    SET(CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE "Debug")
endif()

if(WIN32 AND (${CMAKE_GENERATOR} STREQUAL "MinGW Makefiles"
    OR ${CMAKE_GENERATOR} STREQUAL "MSYS Makefiles"))
    SET(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG "$ENV{CXXFLAGS} -O0 -Wall -g2 -ggdb")
    SET(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_RELEASE "$ENV{CXXFLAGS} -O3 -Wall")
endif()
if(NOT WIN32)
    SET(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_DEBUG "$ENV{CXXFLAGS} -O0 -Wall -g2 -ggdb")
    SET(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_RELEASE "$ENV{CXXFLAGS} -O3 -Wall")
endif()

file(GLOB LUA_SRC 
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/*.c 
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/*.h
)
set(LUA_BIN_SRC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/lua.c)
set(LUAC_BIN_SRC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/luac.c)
list(REMOVE_ITEM LUA_SRC ${LUA_BIN_SRC} ${LUAC_BIN_SRC})

add_library(lua ${LUA_SRC})

set(LUA_HEAD_FILES 
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/lua.hpp
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/lua.h
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/lualib.h
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/luaconf.h
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/src/lauxlib.h
)
set(LUA_INCLUDE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include)

file(INSTALL ${LUA_HEAD_FILES} DESTINATION ${LUA_INCLUDE_DIR})
